name: Spot Trot
tag_list: mobile, music, entertainment, custom, application-development, dave-matthews-band, tim-mcgraw, location-based, streaming-video
overview:
SpotTrot offers a customized mobile platform to musicians and entertainers. Spot Trot is a mobile based (currently iPhone) platform meant to connect entertainers and their fans in an interactive, experience-driven environment. For artists and entertainers, there are multiple revenue streams from in-app merchandise purchases, exclusive purchasable content, sponsorship opportunities and so on. All custom tailored and designed. For the fans, the application allows entertainers to reach their fans wherever they are, with an environment that facilitates chat, Twitter and Facebook integration, user generated content, and exclusive mobile fan community features.

With the requirement of constant feature innovation, Spot Trot is creating an environment for fans to act on the impulses to purchase or interact with the artist from the palm of their hand.
